title: GraphViz2Vec: A Structure-aware Feature Generation Model to Improve Classification in GNNs
abstract: GNNs are widely used to solve various tasks including node classification and link prediction. Most of the GNN architectures assume the initial embedding to be random or generated from popular distributions. These initial embeddings require multiple layers of transformation to converge into a meaningful latent representation. While number of layers allow accumulation of larger neighbourhood of a node it also introduce the problem of over-smoothing. In addition, GNNs are inept at representing structural information. For example, the output embedding of a node does not capture its triangles participation. In this paper, we presented a novel feature extraction methodology GraphViz2Vec that can capture the structural information of a node's local neighbourhood to create meaningful initial embeddings for a GNN model. translated_title: GraphViz2Vec: 一种结构感知的特征生成模型，提高图神经网络中的分类效果
translated_abstract: 图神经网络（GNNs）被广泛应用于解决包括节点分类和链接预测在内的各种任务。大多数GNN体系结构假设初始嵌入是随机的或从流行的分布中生成的。这些初始嵌入需要多层转换才能收敛为有意义的潜在表示。虽然层数可以累积节点的更大邻域，但也会引入过度平滑问题。此外，GNN对于表示结构信息效果不佳。例如，节点的输出嵌入不会捕捉到其参与的三角形。本文提出了一种新颖的特征提取方法GraphViz2Vec，可以捕捉节点局部邻域的结构信息，为GNN模型创建有意义的初始嵌入。这些初始嵌入有助于现有模型在各种分类任务中达到最先进的结果。此外，这些初始嵌入还帮助模型产生...
tldr: GraphViz2Vec是一种结构感知的特征生成模型，通过捕捉节点局部邻域的结构信息来创建有意义的初始嵌入，并帮助图神经网络模型在分类任务中取得最先进的结果。
en_tdlr: GraphViz2Vec is a structure-aware feature generation model that creates meaningful initial embeddings by capturing the structural information of a node's local neighbourhood, and helps GNN models achieve state-of-the-art results in classification tasks.
